mapper.select:
select u.* from sys_user u where 1=1
and u.DEPTPKVALUE in ( select o.ORGPKVALUE from sys_org o where o.CATEGORYCODE = 'Dept' start with o.PARENTPKVALUE='${ORGID}' connect by prior o.ORGPKVALUE=o.PARENTPKVALUE union select '${ORGID}' from dual )
and u.orgpkvalue='${ORGID}'
and u.account like '%${ACCOUNT}%' and u.name like '%${NAME}%' and u.state=${STATE} order by u.code asc

select u.*, up.JOBNAME as job_name from sys_user u, sys_user_position up where u.PSNPKVALUE = up.PSNPKVALUE(+) and u.ACCOUNT is not null and u.state='2'
and u.DEPTPKVALUE in ( select o.ORGPKVALUE from sys_org o where o.CATEGORYCODE = 'Dept' start with o.PARENTPKVALUE='${ORGID}' connect by prior o.ORGPKVALUE=o.PARENTPKVALUE union select '${ORGID}' from dual )
and u.orgpkvalue='${ORGID}'
and u.DEPTPKVALUE in ( select o.ORGPKVALUE from sys_org o where o.CATEGORYCODE = 'Dept' start with o.PARENTPKVALUE='${ORGIDRADIO}' connect by prior o.ORGPKVALUE=o.PARENTPKVALUE union select '${ORGIDRADIO}' from dual )
and u.orgpkvalue='${ORGIDRADIO}'
and u.code like '%${code}%' and u.name like '%${name}%' and u.state=${state} order by u.code asc
select distinct(u.UUID),u.*,up.jobname from sys_user u,sys_user_position up where u.code=up.jobcode(+) and u.uuid=#{uuid}
select up.* from sys_user_position up where up.jobcode=#{jobcode}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user where uuid in(#{uuid})
update sys_user set state=#{state} where uuid in(#{uuid})
mapper.select: select u.account, u.name as userName, o.name as companyName, d.name as deptName from sys_user u, sys_org o, sys_org d where u.org_code = o.code and u.dept_code = d.code and u.state='1' and u.name like '%${userName}%'
select count(*) num from sys_user_role ur where ur.user_id=#{userId} and ur.role_id in (select role_id from sys_role r where r.code='1')
select sr.code,sr.role_name from sys_role sr left join sys_user_role ur on sr.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
